name: 英文寫作與研究方法（二）
comment: 上課教室在雲和街大樓二樓，地址為雲和街1號(位於雲和小火鍋斜對面、Cafe a la mode正對面)，從師大側門右轉看見Starbucks右轉進入巷子步行約2分鐘(130公尺)，右手邊就會看到雲和街大樓，亦可使用Google Maps APP查詢位置。請同學使用學生證感應，進出雲和街上課教室。
description: The course is designed to enable students the following background knowledge and professional skills: (1) To introduce the learners to the concept of ‘ research’; (2) To enable them to understand the stages of research; (3) To familiarize the learners to the procedures involved in research; (4) To introduce them to the conventions of research papers; (5) To familiarize them the techniques and conventions of research documentation.
goals: to conduct their own small scale research
the main aim is to get them familiarized with techniques and methods of selecting topics, developing questions, collecting and analyzing data, preparing the research paper.
The ultimate goal is for the students to produce a presentable research paper.
syllabus:
Week 01: Orientation Meeting

     Unit I: Writing Skills

Week 02: Re-evaluate Your Outline

Week 03: Arrange Your Notes

Week 04: Write a Draft from Your Information Slips

Week 05: Introduction and conclusion

Week 06: Arrive at Findings /conclusions

Week 07: Quotations and acknowledging sources

Week 08: Research format

Week 09: Conventions of documentation

Week 10: Generalization and interpretation

Week 11: Arrange bibliography and webliography

     Unit II: Presentation of research-Part 1   

Week 12: Presentation of findings

Week 13: Language and Style of the Term Paper

Week 14: Edit Your Rough Draft

Week 15: Prepare the Final Copy

     Unit III: Presentation of research- part 2   

Week 16: Presentation Skills

Week 17: Oral Presentation

Week 18: Recapitulation
